sections.purpose: To provide high-frequency sound waves for cleaning and degassing.
sections.scope: Applicable to cleaning and sample prep in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Fill the bath with water and detergent to the marked level.
Place glassware or samples in the stainless steel basket.
Submerge the basket and set the timer and temperature.
Start the ultrasonic cycle and monitor the process.
Once complete, remove the basket and rinse items with distilled water.
Drain and clean the bath regularly.
Switch OFF and unplug the unit after use.
precautions: Never run the bath without water; it will damage the unit.
Do not place items directly on the bottom of the bath.
Keep hands out of the bath during operation.
Degas the bath for 5-10 minutes before the first cleaning cycle.
